file_content.text: Darth Malgus won't take Ilum, will he?
Go right in, Master Jedi. Captain Cantarus is ready to take you to the front lines.
Good, you're here! Captain Cantarus is eager to depart.
I'm afraid Republic defenses are struggling to hold against Darth Malgus's invasion. Do be careful!
I'm afraid this hangar is restricted.
[You must wait a while before repeating this difficulty mode. Return later.]
[You must wait a while before repeating this difficulty mode. Return later.]
Darth Malgus won't take Ilum, will he?
